name: Vector-to-label-plugin
title: Vector-to-label
author: Sudharsan Prativadi (sudharsan.prativadi@labshare.org)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health
citation: Plugin is based on labelling done by Cellpose, https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.02.02.931238v1

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: flowThreshold
inputs.description: Flow error threshold default at 0.8.Margin between vector computed from labelled masks and input vector

inputs.name: stitchThreshold
inputs.description: Stitch threshold default at 0 for stitch 2D masks into 3D volume.(Only for 3d images)

ui.title: Input collection
ui.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin
